text: Ruben De Fuentes (also known as Ruben Raven, born March 15, 1953) is an American musician best known as a replacement guitarist for Steppenwolf from 1979–1980 and Blue Cheer. With the Hollywood Stars, he also recorded the original versions of "King of the Night time World" and "Escape", later released by Kiss and Alice Cooper, respectively. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:American heavy metal guitarists Category:American male songwriters Category:Living people Category:Steppenwolf (band) members Category:Blue Cheer members Category:20th-century American guitarists Category:American male guitarists
